title: John Warnock, Inventor of the PDF, Dies at 82
description: As a founder of Adobe Systems, he oversaw the development of software and systems that made modern personal computing possible.

title: Despite Cheating Fears, Schools Repeal ChatGPT Bans
description: Some districts that once raced to block A.I. chatbots are now trying to embrace them.

title: In Reversal Because of A.I., Office Jobs Are Now More at Risk
description: Technology disruption typically affected blue-collar occupations. Now white-collar workers may feel the brunt of changes.

title: How Schools Can Survive A.I.
description: Step 1: Assume all students are going to use the technology.

title: The U.S. Regulates Cars, Radio and TV. When Will It Regulate A.I.?
description: Congress has tended to be slow to respond to revolutionary technologies.

title: How teachers and students feel about A.I.
description: As the school year begins, their thinking has evolved.
